title: WTB: Pedestrian Cards (Between the Acts Thos Hall 1880s)...
author: michael3322

posts.post_title: WTB: Pedestrian Cards (Between the Acts Thos Hall 1880s)...
posts.post_content:
Hi Everyone.

I am interested in buying the athlete cards in the Thos H. Hall, Between the Acts, Athletes Set (N344) from the 1880s. These include Brown, Ennis, Guton, Hart, Hazael, Merritt, O'Leary, Panghott, Rowell, and Weston.

If you have any of these cards and are interested in selling them, please email me at: [url]memail.m444@gmail.com[/url].

Thanks,
Michael
